data.title: Mobile Commerce Solutions: Sybase 365
data.meta_description: Sybase365 mCommerceSolution DS - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document discusses Sybase 365's mobile commerce solutions that allow companies to engage customers, expand relationships, create loyalty, and acquire new customers through mobile channels. The solutions enable mobile transactions, reduce customer service costs, and provide a single platform for deploying mobile services worldwide. Specifically, Sybase 365 provides end-to-end solutions for mobile banking, payments, and money through products like mBanking, mPayments, mTopUp, and mRemittance. It also offers a mobile commerce platform and additional services to ensure customer success.
